menu.brand: S I G H T H O U N D

seoText.headline: Build the Future, Faster
paragraphs: Sighthound compresses design, permitting, and build timelines by up to 75% with full-stack AI tools for urban infill.
Optimize your pipeline with an all-in-one team, productize repeatable modules, and panelize to bring prefab speed to every project.
Join the wait-list and learn how months of coordination turn into days.
